1122879721925152768.text:
I am blown away by Nick’s site about hiking the mountains in Scotland. Amazing photos, gear reviews, and a lot more.

1008707841643950080.text: Math rendering in m.css just learned how to color parts of equations — both in the #Pelican plugin and in the #Doxygen theme  It can now also respond to window and font size.
